name: IPBlocklistDownload
description: This API is a direct feed to our IP blocklist data

format.description: The data format. Can be either CSV or TXT

include-vpn.description:
Include public VPN provider addresses, this option is only available for Tier 3 or higher accounts. Adds any IPs which are solely listed as VPN providers, IPs that are listed on multiple sensors will still be included without enabling this option.
WARNING: This adds at least an additional 8 million IP addresses to the download if not using CIDR notation

cidr.description: Output IPs using CIDR notation. This option should be preferred but is off by default for backwards compatibility

ip6.description: Output the IPv6 version of the blocklist, the default is to output IPv4 only. Note that this option enables CIDR notation too as this is the only notation currently supported for IPv6

$ul: **api-error**: API error code. If set and > 0 then an API error has occurred your request could not be completed
**api-error**: API error code. If set and > 0 then an API error has occurred your request could not be completed
**api-error**: API error code. If set and > 0 then an API error has occurred your request could not be completed
